--- title: Uploader keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "We wrap all the functionality of the tools built in the `API` and the `converter` modules to upload the rendered markdown document to Medium" description: "We wrap all the functionality of the tools built in the `API` and the `converter` modules to upload the rendered markdown document to Medium" nb_path: "nbs/02_upload.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

nb2medium[source]

nb2medium(title, notebook, log_level='info', log_to_stdout=False)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
first_article = nb2medium(title = 'First test',
                          notebook = '../samples/test-notebook.ipynb')

converter:INFO - Found a hide-source tag in cell #35.
converter:INFO - Found a hide-output tag in cell #36.
converter:INFO - Found a hide-cell tag in cell #37.
converter:INFO - Gist notebooktest.py from cell 26 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Gist print.py from cell 27 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Gist pandas.py from cell 30 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Gist pandas.py.csv from cell 30 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Gist pandas-doubleupload.py from cell 33 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Gist pandas-doubleupload.py.csv from cell 33 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Detected 4 plots and 2 local images in notebook.
converter:INFO - Markdown document written to ../samples/test-notebook/test-notebook.md
uploader:INFO - Draft of 'First test' from test-notebook.ipynb notebook uploaded to Medium: https://medium.com/@lucha6/d13912b13a05
{% endraw %}

I use to log_to_stdout argument to fix an issue with JS Jupyter nbextension API.

{% raw %} 
first_article = nb2medium(title = 'First test',
                          notebook = '../samples/test-notebook.ipynb',
                         log_to_stdout=True)

converter:INFO - Found a hide-source tag in cell #35.
converter:INFO - Found a hide-output tag in cell #36.
converter:INFO - Found a hide-cell tag in cell #37.
converter:INFO - Gist notebooktest.py from cell 26 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Gist print.py from cell 27 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Gist pandas.py from cell 30 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Gist pandas.py.csv from cell 30 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Gist pandas-doubleupload.py from cell 33 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Gist pandas-doubleupload.py.csv from cell 33 succesfully uploaded!
converter:INFO - Detected 4 plots and 2 local images in notebook.
converter:INFO - Markdown document written to ../samples/test-notebook/test-notebook.md
uploader:INFO - Draft of 'First test' from test-notebook.ipynb notebook uploaded to Medium: https://medium.com/@lucha6/9470cedfb8a7
{% endraw %}
